# 6. Arrivals Safe Zone
[color=red]The Bus dock hallway and Arrival Areas are considered a safe zone and absolutely no antag activity or griefing is permitted within that zone.[/color]
The following rules apply to the safe zone: - [color=#ff0000] The Bus dock hallway and Arrival Areas are considered a safe zone and absolutely no antag activity or griefing is permitted within that zone.[/color] This includes but is not limited to destruction, modification, removal, or otherwise restriction of use of any machine or device designed for public use, and the structure of the station itself. - Destroying the bus to Arrivals is strictly forbidden.
